On the satursay night there was a big party going on but it didn't exclude us from going anywhere and although it went on until the early hours no noise travelled to our room so was obviously well soundproofed. Good advice on where to go for a nice meal was provided by the lady on the desk she also explained how and where to use the transport system. Metro was just a 5 - 10 min walk and the tram was situated just outside the hotel. Both ran frequently and you could obtain a card for just 7 euros which lasted both my partner and i the whole trip. Breakfast in the hotel was excellent i could have happily just sat there and eat it all day. Good selection from pastries to fresh fruits, smoked salmon to cheeses. There was something for everyone and plenty of it too. All in all we had a wonderful stay and would definatley go back perhaps for longer and use more of the hotel services the spa and gym looked inviting. Its so hard to sum up our wonderful stay in just a few small paragraphs. Would definatley recommend visiting the hotel for either business or pleasure as from overhearing a few conversations in the lobby they offer great conference facilities also.

Reviews.Title: “chavtastic”
Reviews.Author: bheth
Reviews.Content: if you are over 25 do not stay here. It's a nightclub and walking past 'door staff' security guards did not feel pleasant at night. noise from on site night club vibrated through my pillow. staff were not helpful at all apart from the daytime doorman. Felt like a travel lodge with posher furniture. Stayed in better 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: “A Bit Trendy, but Good Value”
Reviews.Author: robotmuppet
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on our honeymoon. It is very beautiful and the staff is very professional and helpful. The breakfast buffet was the best we've ever had. The location is a bit far out, but only a 20-minute metro ride the main areas of interest in downtown Barcelona. The hotel is probably best for a younger crowd, as it prides itself on its club and its flash appeal. But still, if a good value is desired, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Well ...”
Reviews.Author: holidaylover13
Reviews.Content: Where do I start. The hotel itself is very nice. Very stylish with great rooms - everthing is quite new. You have great view. The hotel has a nice pool area and also the breakfast was quite good - only the fruits and the cheese did not look fresh all the days. Usually for a hotel like this I would rate 5 points, but ... the service and the management of this hotel is way below 5 stars. First we arrived we had to wait a while to check in because there was only on person working at the front desk - with this size of hotel it can take a while. So after checking in we went to "our" room to find out that someone had this room already. This is worst case in a hotel I think. The guy in "our" room was not amused as well. Then we came with our car and had a rate where parking was included, but all the time you wanted to leave you had to explain that because the always wanted to charge for parking. So they always called someone to ask if this is possible to have parking included - very annoying. Also the reception staff was not very friendly. All the people working there - esp. the younger men - look very stylish - but none of them is very professional with guest service. Very sad, because this hotel could be one of the best in Barcelona, but they have to improve many things. Next visit I would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice modern hotel, more for younger crowd”
Reviews.Author: PDXvoyager
Reviews.Content: Very nice and modern. Clean large rooms. Large, lat-panel TV. The location is a bit out of the central area. but would not be a problem with a car. Closest Metro is about 4 blocks away and is not one of the most convenient lines. (A beach is only about 10 blocks away by foot.) The staff was very professional and helpful - extremely attentive. The noise from the club on the main floor was so loud we could hear it on the 13th floor, though it did not keep us awake. If you are 20-35, plan to party and have a car or plan to take taxis, this is a perfect hotel for you. Note, we had an ocean view, but in Barcelona I would actually recommend the city view instead.

Reviews.Title: “SLEAPING IN A NIGHTCLUB”
Reviews.Author: CanTruy
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from a very hot Barcelona The hotel ME Barcelona run by Melia was like walking into a nightclub very loud music and the rooms over the pool were very noisy.The beds were comfy but music until 5am was difficult to sleep.The breakfast was good but the dinning room was full and not able to eat dinner at our hotel was very annoying.The pool was closed for a private function.Very dissapointing

Reviews.Title: “Strange hotel”
Reviews.Author: ShurikFrance
Reviews.Content: It is a bit spooky, the TV goes on by itself during the night, on the other hand, if you want just to watch news you can spend a good deal of time trying to get out of the front page of the TV. The shower is going by itself from time to time, spooky, remember? You also will have fun with learning which button turns on which light. The window in the room is really dirty, water in the tap is yellow. It is resisting you. Looks a bit like 0.5 stars hotel rather than 5 stars one.

Reviews.Title: “Better location than one would expect”
Reviews.Author: piddyman
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently had a very pleasant stay here. The hotel was booked by a friend The friend was nice enough to upgrade our stay so we had access to The Lounge. Very good food and drinks included all day. I think this made a big difference between it being a decent hotel and a very good one. At first we were disappointed about the location of the hotel being far from the action. After venturing around the city on bikes rented from the hotel we realized that the location was actually a plus. The rambla by the hotel is full of locals, free of the tourist, packed vibe of the larger one in the heart of the city. Surprisingly good restaurants for a good price. A nice, quiet section of the beach is about a 10 minute walk from the hotel but the pool on the 6th floor is worth staying close for. The service was excellent. The concierge gave us a very good plan for our bike tour. The rooms were a bit small but well appointed and the Aveda products are always nice.

Reviews.Title: “Luxury at the Level”
Reviews.Author: benjchach
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a few days in April 09, we upgraded to the Level and it was well worth it. You get your own lounge bar with free drinks, appetisers, internet, games consoles. The extra we paid for the upgrade to the level was well worth and covered by the drinks we had in there. The restaurant was very expensive though and did not cater vor veggies. A bit out of the centre but if you dont mind using the metro its fine. Would deffinately stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Great breakfast, but bit out of town...”
Reviews.Author: Eliska_1
Reviews.Content: I've stayed there with my boyfriend for 4 nights. I was looking forward going as it looked fab. When we arrived we've discovered the hotel was not so close to the centre of Barcelona. But once we figured out where the metro was it wasn't so bad. Our room was on the 17th floor and we had nice view of the town. The room was quite small but clean and loved the bathroom. Bed was very comfy. The breakfast was great, inc. champagne and wine (!!!). We booked our holidays as a package, so the price wasn't so bad, but when I checked the prices directly with the hotel I thought it was bit to much. I think it's trying to be more then it is. If you like super-modern style and don't mind it's not so close to the centre, then go for it :). We booked via www.lastminute.com I wouldn't stay there again as I'd like to be more central next time.

Reviews.Title: “A real shame.....”
Reviews.Author: markyrSE1
Reviews.Content: A visually stunning hotel. The rooms were compact but very well designed. No hint of problems with smells, music and drains that have been mentioned on previous reviews. BUT - two big problems: 1. After being told that I was entitled to one item of clothing to be ironed per day - complimentary, I gave my shirt to the very charming lady who showed me my room. The shirt didn't turn up until 45 minutes after I was supposed to leave the following morning making me late for a meeting. I also had to make several calls to get the shirt back. 2. The 22 Euro club sandwich and fries was inedible. A disgrace. It doesn't matter how beautiful and stylish a hotel is, if it can't get the basics right - it should and will fail. I would have whole heartedly recommended this hotel at 9pm on my day of arrival - now, I wouldn't. That's why it's a shame.

Reviews.Title: “Style and design a little out of town”
Reviews.Author: Paulyg123
Reviews.Content: Hotel building looks great and the staff were friendly and professional. Room was great with a floor to ceiling window with views out over the city, a copy of Wallpaper is included as reading material and its very appropriate given the slick interior. Breakfast was a little chaotic, the room is small and the staff struggled to cope with the number of people but the food and coffee was great. The hotel is a little out of the centre of town but there is a metro station close by and you'll be there in about 10 minutes. The area around the hotel has many construction sites at the moment.

Reviews.Title: “Not up to 5 star yet”
Reviews.Author: whatsittoya
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in early december for four nights for a work function. Initially impressed with the service and rooms and full kit out of the hotel. For the suite we had for the conference it was a terribly laid out room in the basement with over heating problems, poor smells and the staff did not seem to know how the lighting worked. It was done from the floor above! To cap it off there was an issue on the final day when 2 laptops bags with other equipment & passports were stolen from the conference room when it was left vacant for an hour. Security were slow to respond but the hotel assisted well. Not sure though how secure the venue is as this kind of thing should NEVER happen in a 5 star. Overall on a leisure stay I would recommend the hotel, funky rooms, Level 25 is cool, Service good etc if you are happy with the relatively short trip to town. For a business conference I would ensure you know what you are getting for your money.

Reviews.Title: “Exellent”
Reviews.Author: Fordbank
Reviews.Content: An excellent, modern hotel with highly stylish decoration. Service was first class as were the restaurants. Parking facilities were available. Beautiful views of Barcelona from the room. A very enjoyable stay.
